question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.

For each of the following statements, please indicate the likelihood that you would engage in the described activity or behavior if you were to find yourself in that situation.

Provide a rating from Extremely Unlikely to Extremely Likely, using the following scale:
  • (1) Extremely Unlikely
  • (2) Moderately Unlikely
  • (3) Somewhat Unlikely
  • (4) Not Sure
  • (5) Somewhat Likely
  • (6) Moderately Likely
  • (7) Extremely Likely
Admitting that your tastes are different from those of a friend.
option_text: Extremely Unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely Likely: 7

question_text: Disagreeing with an authority figure on a major issue.
option_text: Extremely Unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely Likely: 7

question_text: Choosing a career that you truly enjoy over a more secure one.
option_text: Extremely Unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely Likely: 7

question_text: Speaking your mind about an unpopular issue in a meeting at work.
option_text: Extremely Unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely Likely: 7

question_text: Moving to a city far away from your extended family.
option_text: Extremely Unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely Likely: 7

question_text: Starting a new career in your mid-thirties.
option_text: Extremely Unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely Likely: 7

question_text: Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
